The Quranic researcher that those who believe in what was required of him and did the righteous works on the face that they were commanded and established the prayer and the zakat was given to the zakat.Business for the alarm about the greatness of their grace, for the first: the greatest body of the civil and second: Their Lord, and in the expression, is more kind of kindness and supervision, and there is no fear for them, nor are they grieving [277] to inform their luck.
